titleStmt.title: A brief account of the qualifications, vertues, and use of that incomparable extractum humorale, called also Panareton, from that universal operation it hath upon all humoral diseases, that is, proceeding from evil or corrupt humours. / Prepared by Edward [J]ewel Dr. of Physick, and known by the name of his pills.
titleStmt.author: Jewel, Edward.

notesStmt.note: Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) lists author as "Ewel, Edward". The "J" in name apparently failed to print. Cf. item at reel position E8:1[137] where name is given as "Jewel".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
